column2: APRILSKIN Magic Snow Cushoin Black 3.0 (Original Product + Refill Special Set)
column5: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Makeup > Face Makeup
column46: It contains more than 44% moisture serum base and makes you feel confident about your skin under any lighting.It is a product that contains APRILSKIN's special triple cover powder that provides high coverage that perfectly covers any blemishes in an instant.Using a micro-multi-cover powder that combines ALUMINA powder with a transparent refractive index similar to that of the skin with TIO2 powder with excellent coverage, this product reflects the light well to make your skin look milky.FIXATIVE POLYMER, a key ingredient of high adhesion, forms a fixing film that adheres to the skin as soon as it is applied to the skin, and it firmly makes the makeup last long and creates Mochi-like skin that lasts all day long.It contains 44% of the moisture serum essence, and the vegetable moisture serum provides moisture to skin, which benefits all types of skin - dry, oily, and combination types - solving skin problems such as clumping, floating, and dead skin cells.

column46: The product consists of a healthy glow and radiant layer created by 60% essence, smooth skin texture provided by high-adhesion molecules, and a long-lasting power lasting without collapsing, with a close-fitting layer and coating layer structure.Cooling and calming, this product features Mentha Aquatica Extract for pore coverage, a powerful moisturizing essence power holding system, and a double cover with two different sized powders. It provides a clean and bright complexion by adhering closely and covering the skin with moisture.The product contains Mentha Aquatica Extract, providing a cooling effect for a refreshing touch, reducing skin temperature by 125%, calming effects from external temperature stimuli, covering 71% of enlarged pores due to heat, and reducing skin redness by 61%.The moment you apply the essence, it bursts out, instantly providing a powerful moisturizing sensation and adhering refreshingly and moistly to the product.Contains Centella Asiatica Extract, which helps with soothing and elasticity.Contains Mentha Aquatica Extract, allowing for cooling, soothing, and pore coverage.Contains 8 types of peptides that help improve wrinkles and brighten the skin.

column2: AMUSE Jel-Fit Tint
column5: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Makeup > Lip Makeup
column46: Its dewy moisturizing jelly texture is formulated with super-lightweight high-viscosity oil and film former. The tint maintains its color, gloss and hydration for 12 hours with its non-sticky/smudging jelly coating finish. It helps address dead skin on the lips and provides jelly-coating hydration with 8 types of Hyaluronic Acid, Prunus Persica (Peach) Fruit Extract, Vitamin E Acetate, and 10% plant-derived oils.It contains 8 types of Hyaluronic Acid to provide a deeper-reaching moisturizing with low and high-molecules.Enriched with Prunus Persica (Peach) Fruit Extract, it helps enhance tone and texture of the lip skin. It contains Vitamin E Acetate to protect sensitive lip skin from environmental stressors.It helps keep lips hydrated with 10% plant-derived oils including Palm Oil, Coconut Oil, and Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Seed Oil.

column49: ANUA Heartleaf Silky Moisture Sun Cream is a lightweight and moisturizing Heartleaf Silky SUN product that can be used 365 days a year.If your skin is flaky and oily, and your makeup is smudging before your sunscreen has had a chance to settle, then we recommend ANUA Heartleaf Silky Moisture Sun Cream, which will protect your skin all day long with a refreshing feeling.The testers who participated in product development gave different opinions. column46: This is a face cream that contains collagen, elastin, and peptide that are all similar to the human body, and can improve wrinkles and be applied to the entire face.Youth Lasting Eye Cream For Face contains type 1, 3, 21 collagens.Collagen type 1 is the most abundant collagen in the skin, type 3 is the most easily lost collagen, and type 21 is a human-like collagen most commonly found in muscle tissue. This eye cream is thick and moisturizing and provides a formula containing these three different collagens.This is a face cream that contains collagen, elastin, and peptide that are all similar to the human body, and can make a tighter and healthier looking skin.Ultrafine particles were obtained through primary micronization under high pressure by the super-micro process, secondary micronization through a diamond ultrafine nozzle, and tertiary micronization by adding finer particles.

column46: Since it touches the skin every day, in order to be closer to the skin, the content of collagen similar to the human body was doubled compared to the previous product, AHC Youth Lasting Real Eye Cream for Face, and the care effect was enhanced by containing human stem cell culture medium containing 1,391 proteins.With 84 kinds of protein, 16 kinds of vitamins, 11 kinds of hyaluronic acid, and 10 kinds of collagen, the effect is doubled compared to the previous product even if you use half of it.Because it touches the skin, it is made with ingredients closer to the skin and has twice the human-like collagen content compared to the previous product, enhancing the effect.The iconic eye cream contains collagen No. 1, No. 3, and No. 21, three different types of collagen similar to the human body allowing firm, dense, and elastic care: No. 1 is the most collagen in the skin, No. 3 is the most easily lost collagen, and No. 21 is the collagen that exists in muscle tissue a lot.AHC's stem cell culture medium jointly researched and developed with CellinBio, which has studied stem cells for 15 years, contains as many as 1,391 proteins per bottle, it is a human stem cell culture medium closer to the skin, and liposome technology that enhances absorption is applied to increase the care effect, and it has been verified with thesis data.

column46: [Only for Men Toner]It contains a Moist Calming Complex, which moisturizes and soothes sensitive skin caused by frequent shaving.It contains the black complex, which provides intensive nutrition and manages the skin's firm and smooth texture by supplying the insufficient nutrients to the skin.It combines five types of black foods (black bean, blackberry, bilberry fruit/leaf, rice, and sesame extract) to form a moisture barrier and fill nutritional gaps.It contains Mentha Canadensis Leaf, Triticum Vulgare Sprout, and Platycodon Grandiflorus Root extract to control excess sebum and provide smooth, grease-free skin.Anthemis Nobilis flower/leaf, Centaurea Cyanus Flower Water, black bean, blackberry, bilberry fruit/leaf, rice, and sesame extract help to soothe sensitive skin with three botanical ingredients.[Only For Men Lotion]It contains the black complex, which provides intensive nutrition and manages the skin's firm and smooth texture by supplying the insufficient nutrients to the skin.It combines five types of black foods (black bean, blackberry, bilberry fruit/leaf, rice, and sesame extract) to form a moisture barrier and fill nutritional gaps.It contains Mentha Canadensis Leaf, Triticum Vulgare Sprout, and Platycodon Grandiflorus Root extract to control excess sebum and provide smooth, grease-free skin.Anthemis Nobilis flower/leaf, Centaurea Cyanus Flower Water, black bean, blackberry, bilberry fruit/leaf, rice, and sesame extract help to soothe sensitive skin with three botanical ingredients.
